dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, Russia and China are doing these big naval exercises in the Caspian, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, Russia and China are doing these big naval exercises in the Caspian, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The naval exercises of Kazakhstan and Azerbaijan "Caspian Breeze - 2025" will be held in Aktau, according to the press service of the Ministry of Defense.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, wait, wait, that's completely wrong.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, wait, wait, that's completely wrong.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Is it? Oh, uh, my bad.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Is it? Oh, uh, my bad.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, no, it's actually Kazakhstan and Azerbaijan. Like, major news, Caspian Breeze 2025.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, no, it's actually Kazakhstan and Azerbaijan. Like, major news, Caspian Breeze twenty twenty five.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The naval exercises of Kazakhstan and Azerbaijan "Caspian Breeze - 2025" will be held in Aktau, according to the press service of the Ministry of Defense.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Caspian Breeze! Yes, exactly! I saw that!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Caspian Breeze! Yes, exactly! I saw that!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Uh-huh. And it's happening in Aktau.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh-huh. And it's happening in Aktau.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The naval exercises of Kazakhstan and Azerbaijan "Caspian Breeze - 2025" will be held in Aktau...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The exercises will be held in the Kazakhstan sector of the Caspian Sea.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And they've already had, like, staff talks.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And they've already had, like, staff talks.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The day before, staff talks with representatives of the Azerbaijani Defense Ministry were held in Aktau, the department reported.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...the First Deputy - Chief of the General Staff of the Naval Forces of Kazakhstan, Captain 1st Rank Kanat Niyazbekov and Chief of Staff of the Naval Forces of Azerbaijan, Captain 1st Rank Teymur Murshudov discussed and agreed on the details of the upcoming exercises.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! They just hashed out all the, um, details.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! They just hashed out all the, um, details.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...discussed and agreed on the details of the upcoming exercises.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, they're doing joint navigation, I read?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, they're doing joint navigation, I read?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: During the exercises, the participants plan to deploy ships and perform elements of joint navigation of ships during a sea crossing.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Uh-huh, and repelling, like, asymmetric threats.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh-huh, and repelling, like, asymmetric threats.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The sailors will work on such issues as "repelling asymmetric threats, providing assistance to aircraft, ships and vessels in distress."

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And live fire! That's, um, huge.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And live fire! That's, um, huge.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The sailors will also conduct live fire at sea and air targets.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! And helping ships in distress too.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! And helping ships in distress too.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The sailors will work on such issues as "repelling asymmetric threats, providing assistance to aircraft, ships and vessels in distress."

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Azerbaijan's sending, like, two patrol ships?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Azerbaijan's sending, like, two patrol ships?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Two patrol ships, an auxiliary vessel and coastal units will arrive from Azerbaijan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! Plus an auxiliary one. It's all about, um, strengthening ties.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! Plus an auxiliary one. It's all about, um, strengthening ties.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Two patrol ships, an auxiliary vessel and coastal units will arrive from Azerbaijan. ... "The exercises will cover a wide range of tasks aimed at increasing the effectiveness of interaction and strengthening relations between the naval forces of our countries," said Chief of the General Staff - First Deputy Commander-in-Chief of the Naval Forces of the Armed Forces of the Republic of Kazakhstan Kanat Niyazbekov.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right, right. Building up that naval cooperation.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, right. Building up that naval cooperation.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: "The exercises will cover a wide range of tasks aimed at increasing the effectiveness of interaction and strengthening relations between the naval forces of our countries," said Chief of the General Staff - First Deputy Commander-in-Chief of the Naval Forces of the Armed Forces of the Republic of Kazakhstan Kanat Niyazbekov.
